website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a lip stain that won't dry out your lips, this is the one to choose. It offers the best of both worlds with color that wears well for most users and a moisturizing formula.
pros: A crayon lip stain that's infused with plant-based butters for creamy application
Feels lightweight and moisturizing, and has a pleasant scent
cons: Provides long wear, but the stain it leaves behind is somewhat pale
Some of the colors look different in person and on the lips than they do in the tube

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Typically I use higher end makeup, however this came recommended. I was skeptical- but wow!!! What a great lip color. I purchased honey and feel it would be universal. Wouldn’t consider it a stain, but it does stay put for quite a long time and doesn’t dry out my lips at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Dorman

customer_reviews.title: Verify color before purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: Picture of Sweetheart color is NOT accurate. It's magenta pink, not coral.
customer_reviews.author: barneyreggie

customer_reviews.title: Romantic is too orange
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Romantic. It is MUCH more orange than I was expecting. Its almost like a bronze color. It glides on smooth and is a bit tingling. I wish it was more red like the picture seemed to imply.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: No more red lipstick getting on everything
customer_reviews.text: 3rd time buying this stuff. I wear it almost every day. A win win, I get red lips, my husband doesn’t get red kisses all over his mouth. It feels like wearing a very subtle mint chapstick. After the chapstick wears away the tint still remains. I usually prefer red with more warm hue, this is a warmer toned red rather than a cool tone.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin D

customer_reviews.title: Love Rendevous OVER Honey Douce!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Rendezvous OVER another color! I am fair skinned with red undertones, dark blonde hair and green eyes. By itself, on me, this color is a glaring orange. But when I layer it over Honey Douce 001 (muted mauve pink) it absolutely ups the glamour game! It brings my lips to life! It’s sheer enough that the Honey Douce shows through yet the Rendevous adds a great depth and sparkle. I don’t wear it OR Honey Douce alone. For me, Honey Douce by itself is a bit ho-hum. And Rendezvous alone is too orange. But put them together, and oh, honey! Talk about fireworks!❤️
customer_reviews.author: M. Burk

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but no stain
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t found that this is a stain but it does have a nice natural glossy color at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Staying power
customer_reviews.text: Creamy, not sticky. The moisturizing lasts a long time. The stain is pretty resilient, too. I was off on the color, in terms of what looks good on me, but when you’re choosing this type of colored product and only have a picture of the tube to go on, it’s a bit of a shot in the dark. A different color that looked a little better on me would have been great, but those are the chances you take. I couldn’t find these balm stains in stores so they may have been discontinued which saddens me.
customer_reviews.author: golli-1112

customer_reviews.title: Not a stain
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, but it's not a stain. Plus the color, honey, is much more pink that it looks online; I realize lipstick colors are hard to determine online though. I am very disappointed that the color doesn't last at all. It doesn't dry out my lips though, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: You can taste and feel the peppermint oil
customer_reviews.text: I like the neutral color of Honey and it's pleasantly tacky (moisturizing?) and lasts for at least until coffee break time. It is also not overly pearly (if at all) as it looks on the Amazon landing page. The thing that some folks may not like is that this item contains peppermint oil which gives your lips a tingling feeling and also puts a slight taste in your mouth. Some folks may really like that feeling but I'm only ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joycedevivre

customer_reviews.title: which works for me better and I do like the consistency
customer_reviews.text: The color was lighter than I expected - I thought it would be closer to Clinique's Black Honey, based on the photo. It's lighter than my natural lip color and has a mauve-y tint so makes me look kind of ghastly. Not a fan...I do have this in a different color, which works for me better and I do like the consistency. It's easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not a stain at all.  Honey isn’t as seen.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is not even CLOSE to the color I received. Luckily, Amazon is amazing and is fixing it. I should know better to buy new makeup things online, but sometimes, when the wine is talking, I swipe buy now. I guess I am glad it doesn’t actually work as a stain either since the color was like, Barbie pink.
customer_reviews.author: MeganSays

customer_reviews.title: The color is easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I wear this color nearly every day. The color is easy to apply, it's just a big crayon, and it really stays. I do a light rubbing if I want a more natural, daytime blush of color, and it's easy to go over it again with a bit more pressure to deepen up the color for nighttime. Great stuff! Doesn't have the strong smell or taste that many lipsticks have, and it really lasts. Also, doesn't dry out my lips the way most long wearing lip color does. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: not a stain, but I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it with one small down fall... it is supposed to be a stain, but I find myself reapplying frequently. I will reorder again though because I love the way it moisturizes, I love the color and the tingly peppermint taste it has. I ordered the Honey color and I like it, it's a barely there color when you first apply it, and as it wears it gets a little pink for my liking but I just reapply. Lately I've been sticking with stains because I get annoyed by having to reapply my lip color every hour or less, but I do like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: So happy I was able to find them. They are no longer sold in stores.
customer_reviews.text: I was so sad when I could no longer find this item in the pharmacies anymore. This was my safe, go-to color. It’s the perfect red, not orangey color like some, and not like a pink, the under color of this red has a deep tone, but the glossy moisturizing balm it comes as makes the red look like almost a natural lip tone for almost all skin tones, which is why I love this color particularly. I was so happy I could still find them somewhere at least. I’m trying to really stock up on them. I hope I can always find them on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this the first day I got!!! I didn't see much color, but, I thought it felt pretty good on. As the day went on something caused me to start to lick my lips &, by the end of the day my lips were on fire!!! I don't know what is in it, but it didn't agree with me. I could hardly wait to get home & wash it off!!!! I THREW IT AWAY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee W

customer_reviews.title: Nice balm - not a stain
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tinted lip balm - very soft and goes on smoothly. But it is NOT a stain, as it says in the title. I expect a stain to actually stain my lips for a period of time. This is nice but has very little staying power, even less than a traditional lipstick, I think. If it's cheap and you're just looking for a quick hit of soft color and some moisturizing, this is fine. If you want something with any sort of staying power, keep looking. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Megs814

customer_reviews.title: Reminiscent of Ronald McDonald's color orange
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to believe that this color would look good on anyone it is so, so, so orange! It almost glows. That's not the look for me. It may be as good for somebody but if you're looking for a nice, normal, coral color my advice is to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly, I like this
customer_reviews.text: Nondrying, and really does offer some color through about half a day. I took off half a star as I had to pair with a brighter pink to get the rose'ish color I'm looking for. This really is more brown than I like. But you can mix the colors by applying one over the over. Seems to be lasting long enough - I will definitely buy again. I do use lip balm over it, but a couple of times I've forgotten - so it's pretty 'quenching'.
customer_reviews.author: Bobblefrog

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! The color is PERFECT on fair skin.
customer_reviews.text: I love these Revlon balm stains! They are super moisturizing and apply beautifully. I love that once the balm wears off there is still color, and the stain wears super well throughout the day. I usually reapply a couple of times because I like the feel of the balm, but I think that the stain would last all day even without reapplying. I have a couple of colors now, and this is by far my favorite. I have very fair skin, and this is such a pretty hint of color without being overwhelming. Perfect for a day at the office.
customer_reviews.author: jjbanana

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find this at the stores anymore, this is my favorite go to, I have one on my golf cart, keep in my car, it doesn't melt on hot days, stays on my lips a long time and is easy to use. Plus it's my favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Gingermcg

customer_reviews.title: TOO LIGHT IN PINK SHADE
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy with this light color...It looked darker on my computer....Didn't ask for refund tho...I'm sure they would've been nice about it..I havent used it and still have it, if they wanna take it back???
customer_reviews.author: Ms M. Threadgill

customer_reviews.title: I love this lip product, but what was sent was unusable
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip product and was upset that Revlon discontinued the product. Imagine my delight at finding it on Amazon. I really should have taken seriously some of the reviews that mentioned the lipstick being broken inside the tube. I ordered two and the both arrived all twisted to the top and broken off inside the cap. So disappointing and frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: LidoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Too dark
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is not horrible. The balm feels nice and has a minty essence. But the color of the Adore is SO DARK. I looked at the reviews before purchasing, and expected a buildable sheer stain. Instead it was like the Vamp color that was popular in the mid ‘90’s. Any return it since I swiped it on my lips, so it will go in the dress up box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Intense pink
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice color but a little intense to be worn as an everyday. I'm a student and if I wear it to class I feel like I might be trying too hard -- it's incongruent with my casual sweatpants I wear to class. Of course for a more appropriate occasion it's a nice, bright magenta/pink color, layerable/able to build intensity, and has a nice dewy texture that I really like -- not matte but not as goopy as lip gloss -- this leads to it not lasting very long though. If you're looking for a more everyday color, I recommend the Revlon Colorburst Balm Stain in Honey!!
customer_reviews.author: S.C. Trojan

customer_reviews.title: Non-irritating with great subtle color
customer_reviews.text: The color was perfect. Not real bright or saturated. Goes on easily, even without a mirror! Buying any lip product is always a gamble for me. I seem to have a sensitivity to most of them and end up with peeling, yucky lips. No problem at all with this product.
customer_reviews.author: PrimoCat

customer_reviews.title: For my preferences, this is the best lip product.
customer_reviews.text: All of these balm stains are the best thing ever. I like having colors on my lips, but I live in a very cold dry place where I need to regularly apply chapstick. This stain is moderately moisturizing on its own, but if you need more the color doesn’t wipe away when you apply something on top. This is a lovely red, and Honey is a my-lips-but-better shade. I’ve been using them for years, almost 5 at this point, and while I keep trying other things, they never compare. But that’s my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: No Color No Stain
customer_reviews.text: After finally being able to get the packaging off I was very anxious to try Moist - yes. That’s the only true part of the description There is NO pigment. NO stain What is does have is a medicinal smell resembling menthol Definitely not using. Can’t even tell I have it on !
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color and consistency
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat user of this product, having originally discovered it by recommendation from a beauty blog. The color is perfect for my lips - is close to their natural color, and provides a nice polished look. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: twofoxes

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic rosy pink for every day!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lip stain, easy to wear, weightless feel and it lasts. My go-to for everyday and my local stores are always sold out of this ‘honey’ shade! It is a rosy pink color, not orangey and not honey-colored at all, name makes no sense. Should be called Peony or Rose. Can gloss over it with a sunscreen balm without losing the color as well. Do not leave it in a hot car, like all lipsticks, it will melt!
customer_reviews.author: Miki Laurent

customer_reviews.title: I like this product because it stays
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it stays. It is like a lip tint. This color is good when I want a natural look with a bit of gloss. However I had to order a darker color for wearing out. It is nice that it does not wear off as easily as plain gloss. It is not shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Monfort

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and how easy it is to apply
customer_reviews.text: I wear this a lot ive always had trouble putting on lipstick I mean i know girls it on the bottom lip and rub thier lips together that has never worked for me Andi have to apply it slowly and draw my top and bottom lip with the lipstick! However this color is so close to my lip tone that it blends so easily and I can put it in quickly and not mess up.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect "natural" coloring
customer_reviews.text: Perfect "natural" coloring. I wanted a pink tint and got the "sweetheart" but it came and was a bright neon pink. OMG! So I had it returned for the "honey" and it was the perfect "neutral" shade but with a hint of pink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost NO color
customer_reviews.text: I got a lighter pink color and when putting it on, it looks more like a lightly shaded chapstick. I can't imagine it'll stay on long either.. Goes on smooth, but I might as well have bought Bonnie Bell chapstick. I wouldn't recommend as a lip stain.. I have to keep searching:(
customer_reviews.author: American Honey

customer_reviews.title: Color is much paler than shown
customer_reviews.text: The color of lipgloss is so much paler than was shown on screen (sorry I don’t have a pic). Since I’m fair-skinned, you’d think it’s not a problem.....but I have a dark freckle on my upper lip (thanks, aging!) and the color doesn’t cover at all. I have #80–darker—shade of same line, which covers; guess it’s just a matter of shade!
customer_reviews.author: FC1

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a Stain
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful color. As others have mentioned it's a grown-up pink. The price is right. It feels good on the lips, doesn't dry out the lips at all. I was looking for a true stain and this is definitely not it. It lasts about the same amount of time as your average lipstick (maybe 2 hours..?). I'm using it a ton tho because it's pretty and feels good...but it's not the stain I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Color extremely misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sweetheart shade and it is BRIGHT pink, much more so than the picture, which is more of a natural color. Very disappointed in the misrepresentation of the color. I now have a useless balm stain that I will likely end up throwing out. Thanks Revlon.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: The minty scent is fresh and nice. I think it'll last for awhile since I ...
customer_reviews.text: A little darker than expected ("Adore"), but that may be because I'm unused to wearing more than tinted gloss, and this has more color/coverage to it than that (but still less than a traditional lipstick). The minty scent is fresh and nice. I think it'll last for awhile since I use it pretty lightly, and I'll happily buy again when it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: A great color
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to order lip colors via internet but this is the very best out of three I have ordered. Now I am 75 with gray to white hair and don’t where a lot of makeup but I like a little color and this is prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch or unauthentic product
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this exact brand and color stain for years. However, this item is not the same as the previous ones I've had. The color doesn't last like it always has, and the packaging feels different as well. The seal is not the same as when you buy in the store either. This product was either from a bad batch or an unauthentic product. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazona

customer_reviews.title: Very sheer
customer_reviews.text: I think they changed the formula of thiS, I used to Prefer this balm to the Clinique chubby sticks but for some reason when I bought this one it is very sheer. It still is smooth and moisturizing but barely has any color. It’s a shame I have worn this same brand and color for years now
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love! Buildable, beautiful color that stays on you and not your love!
customer_reviews.text: I love Honey color balm stain, my second tube is almost gone. It is a very light, buildable sheer neutral-rose color and really just looks like my lips but better. I love all of the balm stains because they feel great and light on my lips, and when I kiss my guy I don't make him all sorts of crazy colors. I genuinely have almost every color of balm stain, and Honey and Crush I'm on my 2nd and 3rd tubes, respectively!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this lip stain would put color on my lips that would last a good part of the day. It does not. Very light and wore off after an hour and one cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love this lip stain- honey
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I read the reviews and got this lip stain. It’s my absolute favorite and the girls were right about the color honey. It’s a great, natural color. The little bit of peppermint in the stain is a nice extra too.
customer_reviews.author: KJA

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Color is a bit off though.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of these balm stains in general. The product feels and smells great. You can get great saturation with the color and the color lasts quite a while considering it goes on as a balm. This color "smitten" is much lighter and pinker that the dark berry you might anticipate though. On my lips, it reads as 80's inspired hot pink, which I sort of enjoyed after I got over the initial shock. Just something to keep in mind if you go for this partial hue.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth King

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lip balm and color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this color (045 Romantic) before, and was happy to find it on Amazon. It relatively sheer, and doesn’t last that long, but it’s a great color and great balm. I love it! Packaging was simple, and right-sized for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lulisgramma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in 2 different colors and Honey was the better of the two by far. I like this lip tint underneath a gloss. It is moisturizing and the color is pretty. I have dishwater blonde hair, fair skin, and green eyes.
customer_reviews.author: ejonesey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty shade- one swipe, it's a deep coral/ light red. Each additional swipe has the color deepening, though never to a point where it is like a burgundy/maroon. If you hate orange/pink tinted reds, this color is for you!!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: It has a gritty texture & tastes bad TRASH
customer_reviews.text: I bought the honey color & it does not look like advertised color. It has a weird gritty texture & taste bad. I won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered in sweetheart. I love it and got a lot of compliments but found it was a little more pink than my liking. It's very moist and it literally lasts about all day. I've bought a few more in other colors. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 4

customer_reviews.title: Don't judge a lipstick by the packaging color it's in...
customer_reviews.text: When it first arrived I looked at the light pink packaging color and thought- whoah, that color is way off compared to how it was described. But don't judge a lipstick by it's cover- inside it is indeed a deeper, more mauve-y color. A perfect everyday color. I agree with the other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Giampa

customer_reviews.title: Keeps lips soft, not too dark
customer_reviews.text: Love the Honey color! It's natural enough that it just gives a hint of color so it doesn't look strange as it wears off slowly. Another plus: because it's not super dark, I can apply it without looking in a mirror and not worry that going a bit outside the lines of my lips will make me look ridiculous. It is like colored chapstick, but has a nicer look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki K.

customer_reviews.title: I would not classify this as a stain at all
customer_reviews.text: I like this product BUT it is simply a lipstick, not a stain! I have ordered three of these now in the Honey color which is a nice natural looking pink color. For me, it stays on about as long as any other lipstick (not that long) but it is nice and moist and a good color for me.
customer_reviews.author: MsJava

customer_reviews.title: Short on Moisture
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color, the perfect pink. Unfortunately, it doesn't last very well on me and actually makes my lips feel dry about 15 minutes after application. Heartbroken because the color is exactly what I've been looking for. Cons outweigh pros for me.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: Pigment: Rendezvous is a great summer orange. Brightens things up regardless of what you're wearing. Though, if you have pink lips that make everything color darker than it looks, beware... "Kissing Balm" claim: This is pretty drying. I make sure to apply a separate lip balm before this; otherwise it drags on the delicate skin of the lips, feels very 'tight' on, and worst of all bits of it flake off from your lips. Very unflattering. "Experience": The cap comes off frequently in my makeup bag. Not cool. Price: The current $5 is a good deal...I bought mine a few weeks ago at $6.48.
customer_reviews.author: Picky?

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth and fades the same way
customer_reviews.text: It stays pretty well and when it fades it doesn’t leave that line around the edges. I often use another lipstick over it after it has sat.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Seals

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! I don't wear makeup often, and when I do, I don't want to have to reapply often. This stuff is amazing! It tingles a little, gives very rich, lasting color, I never reapply and get compliments of how my lipstick has lasted so long! Much better than the two step long lasting lipstains that are sticky and wear off on the inside of your lips and look fake. This looked literally like my lips were just darker, it felt like I had nothing on at all and if I wanted a more polished look I simply topped it off with chapstick!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Since first trying this lip stain, I've bought several more in different colors. The colors are beautiful with a sheer stain that doesn't dry out my lips like other lip-stains do. It's smooth and keeps my lips soft without being overly glossy and stickey. It's also a great lip product for chapped lips because it doesn't have that cakey, peeling obvious chapped lips look that lipstick has when wearing...It smoothes and soothes lips reducing the look of dry, cracked flaking lips while still being able to have color on them. I use them everyday and love them. They even work great applied over regular lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Dianalynn

customer_reviews.title: Natural color at great price. Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and you don't have to use a mirror. Nice, natural color blends with lips and creates soft coverage without exaggerating lips. Great price
customer_reviews.author: KBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Moisture and color are long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This lip stain is the best I've found for moisturizing and staying on. I have been addicted to carmex for 25 years or more and need to have a moist and smooth feeling on my lips. Most lip stains feel dry and wear quickly if you apply a moisturizer on top. Revlon balm stain lasts until you eat and wipe your mouth, it then needs to be reapplied.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shade (Romantic)
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using head balms for many years, but have never tried this shade. After seeing a YouTuber I like wearing it often and recommending I decided to pick it up (Romantic). I absolutely adore it. And so inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: CarrieLou

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for lip color that stays, this is it. Easy to apply. Put it on once in the morning and forget about it until after lunch. I reapply after brushing my teeth and it stays on for the rest of the day. I now have two of these and they have become my main go-to for lip color.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to lip color for everyday
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to lip color for everyday. It's a natural color, keeps my lips moist and lasts a really long time! I bought several, one in my purse, one in my bathroom, a& a backup just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: No like
customer_reviews.text: Not a good color hue for me was too purple on me my skin tone my skin is very olive just didn’t look right I was expecting more of a natural tone but nope
customer_reviews.author: Chloe meyer

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: The color I received looked nothing like the color in the pphoto. Photo showed a deep, wine color and I received a baby pink color
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Honey
customer_reviews.text: Honey is now my new favorite go to color. The color last a long time and I only need to reapply 1 or 2 times a day. When the glossiness wears off the color stays stained on my lips. I'm very happy with my purchase. I have them in a few other colors too, but honey is by far my favorite for my cool complexion and light colored skin.
customer_reviews.author: Riddler

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors that last for hours but most definitely not balm-like at all. Very drying. I should have only bought one to try instead of three. My lips were worse afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: tania

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color , long lasting stain
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color and even though it is considered a balm, the intensity of the color produces a very pretty and subtle long lasting stain. Very comfortable and lightweight, not drying . I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a makeup person but I love this product in this color. It was discontinued so I was very excited to find it to hide away when my current one runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Cammarata

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted. What a waste!
customer_reviews.text: This color looked nothing like the photo. It was hideous! Not suitable for me or my skin tone at all (it might look great on you but I was terribly disappointed. Even though I didn't open it, Amazon wouldn't allow it to be returned so I had to just throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stain on the market
customer_reviews.text: It is moisturizing and it has staying power -- I keep quite a few of these on hand!! LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: K. K. Schiller

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth but not long lasting stain.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit orangier than expected. Feels nice as a gloss when on but comes off easily and doesn't last long. Nice to use instead of chapstick for a touch of color.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Webster

customer_reviews.title: Not a matte finish.
customer_reviews.text: I assumed it would be darker from the picture. Love the minty smell. Frequently need to reapply and not really a true stain, more like a balmy lipstick and glossy finish as opposed to a stain which would be like eating a Popsicle and matte.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works pretty well. I have to reapply after eating
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this stuff works pretty well. I have to reapply after eating, and the "lipsticky" shine goes away quickly, but as a stain it lasts a couple of hours. It feels moisturizing and smooth when applied, very much a balm feel. For the price it's a good deal. My only issue was with the color I received, far more "berry" than it appeared on the monitor, but I'm sure that is my monitor issue. Just keep in mind that this shade, smitten, is more berry than red.
customer_reviews.author: Miss

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Not an all day wear but it stays on nicely for a while. It has just enough color to look natural with my extremely white skin. It is like a high end lip balm. The fat pencil make it easy to carry around and apply.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stain as well as darker or more vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't stain as well as the darker colors, which makes sense I suppose, but I love it. It's slightly darker than my natural lip color so it's very subtle but it makes my eyes and lips pop, in my opinion. My skin has cool undertones and is pretty fair although I can tan and my veins aren't super visible.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturing but no pigment
customer_reviews.text: It looks great as a colour. However on medium skin tones with a little darker lips, the pigmentation is almost non existent. It is almost equivalent to a lip balm with a little hint of colour.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite 'natural' color
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite 'natural' color. It comes off as a unobtrusive mauve. If I don't eat anything after the first few hours of application, it tends to stain pretty well. But the stain almost always appears as a pink color. It's not horrendous clown pink, but it's definitely a different color. But Even when it fades, it fades pretty naturally. And it's a balm so I don't feel bad when/if I reapply it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great shade...hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Just like drugstore. Cant eber find this shade which is a perfect bee sting pink for my complexion. I also have always loved the formula and consistancy of this product...I always recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture, but perfect lip product
customer_reviews.text: The picture is much darker than the actual product, which I knew when I purchased it, as this is my favorite lip product. I have worn it every day since 2013 and am frequently complimented. Please note that the "honey" shade is not the berry color in the picture, but at least two or three shades lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Erica W.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as others I've used.
customer_reviews.text: This color stick is a lot firmer than others I've used. Makes it harder to apply but yet it doesn't seem to last any longer. It was a better price though, and does get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Annie M daffodils

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting a "balm stain" to be sparkly. The color is exactly what I was looking for, and it goes on easy and the color lasts really well for a balm, but I just don't wear sparkly for a regular daytime look, and if I had known, I wouldn't have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLLama

customer_reviews.title: wet n wild competes with Revlon!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and wet n wild Silk Finish Lipstick, Blind Date & they are almost completely the same. Same color, same staying power. The only difference is Revlon is slightly more emmolient.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: I liked Honey considering my fair skin tone.
customer_reviews.text: Honey is the best color for fair skin people. I am an Indian but fair skin and it looks good for daily use purpose. And my Indian friends with darker skin tone try smitten or Romantic (coral) shade. But I do want to try romantic myself for occasional wear.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: The best moisturizing lip stain!!
customer_reviews.text: This is soothing, smoothing, and addicting!! After two hours of wear, sipping tea, eating, it looks like I just applied it! Now I want to order one in every color. This does not look like lipstick-- it's like a lip stain!
customer_reviews.author: alaskafan

customer_reviews.title: Found my new favorite lip stain
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Stays on all day without drying my lips. It feels like I'm not wearing lip products at all. This color also gives me just the right amount of color to make a "natural" look pop. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quite act like a stain and doesn't last like a stain but overall I like the color, the way it feels on my lips, and that it does last longer than lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Madje

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The color okay but much lighter than I expected, it’s gives me a tint darker than my natural lip color. I wanted a dark color like in this picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed  : (
customer_reviews.text: Feels like very inexpensive waxy color crayon.. Not really a stain, as there is very little tint to it at all. Weird, because that the lip crayon itself is a beautifully vibrant color, but I really didn't much more of a slight tint after 6 layers. I won't be purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: popcornfrenzy

customer_reviews.title: Best everyday lip product of all time.
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to lip color for YEARS. Not too red, not too pigmented, not too shear, not too sticky, not glossy but also not matte and leaves moisture and a hint of color even when it is faded. I love it and will never stray from it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Fortenberry

customer_reviews.title: Good but not my fave color
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it is very dark. It works I just wish there were more color options. I’m not a huge fan of the dark red lips look.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy B

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit more pink than I had thought it would be but I was still very happy with the color. This has a mint smell and tingles a little when you put in on. It glides on like butter and is very moisturizing! I do have to reapply it every so often but I am okay with that because it's just more moisture! Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hthomps

customer_reviews.title: New obsession
customer_reviews.text: This balm stain is so moisturizing and the color is amazing as well. It almost has a minty type of feeling on your lips, but it doesn't burn or anything, it's a nice feeling. The stain stays on for several hours after the balm has soaked in and/or wears off, but it came off easily with a makeup remover wipe. This was a nice change from some other stains that I've tried that are a pain to remove. It also stained a nice consistent color, not blotchy like some stains can be. It comes in many colors and I have almost all of them, but Honey is my favorite! Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color. It’s very moisturizing, and I only had to do a retouch after two hours. Now I want to buy more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Paisley7

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the mattes!
customer_reviews.text: I love their matte versions so I wanted to give this a try. I was a bit disappointed on how it applies on the lips. It was moisturizing but it also eventually accentuated the lines and cracks on my lips. The color was nice but I needed to reapply a few times before it showed. You will also need a lip liner otherwise, the stain will bleed out. It also didn't last as long as the matte sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Roll back the clock
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for the patchiness of the color application. I also expected a "stain" to, well, stain. the color had to be reapplied often. The color was also light and very pink. I would have liked the product and color, when I was 16.
customer_reviews.author: DFR

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this color
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this color and like the way it looks. The color looks very natural on me and has a wonderful shine. Buying lipsticks can be challenging on the internet as color varies but really glad I bought this and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lovinglife

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BALM STAIN!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this balm stain. They don’t sell them anymore I don’t think In drug stores so I’m happy they have it on amazon. It does last like a chapstick does so pretty good wear. It smells like peppermint which is exactly what I love. It DOES stain my lips after it wears off. All in all great product and hope they continue to make it
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: You do not need a mirror to apply and gives off quite a bit of color. Comes off easily after eating but so easy to reapply like a lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Minotaar

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful RED that does not scream "Prostitute"!! It's a lovely Red that is just a bit understated! I have porcelain skin and finding a RED Lipstick has been short of impossible! This color goes on smooth and even though it is a stick, it's moist & creamy!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Champ

customer_reviews.title: Read this review before buying
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter on that I had hoped. Didn't last long, but none ever do on me. Not really a stain at all. More of just a thicker lipstick crayon, if you will.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Knox

product_meta.title: Revlon Balm Stain, Romantic
product_meta.description:
Style Name:ORIGINAL| Color:RomanticRevlon Balm Stain lip crayon is a lightweight lipstain infused with balm-like moisture. With a Triple Butter Complex of shea, mango, and coconut butter, Revlon Balm Stain leaves your lips feeling soft and nourished with a perfect flush of color. The retractable end on the chubby lip crayon design is easy to use and can go with you anywhere – no sharpener required. Available in 8 nourishing, kissable shades, add your favorite Revlon Balm Stains to your lip color collection.

BRAND STORY
By Revlon
feature_bullets: Lightweight lip stain for the perfect flush of color
Infused with a Triple Butter Complex of shea, mango, and coconut butter
Retractable chubby crayon, no sharpener required
